summary: Federal agencies can help fund small businesses' technology research and development. This report—the 3rd in a series—looks at agency funding under "open topics." Awarding funds this way lets businesses define problems and pitch solutions within broad topic areas rather than only solving predefined problems. These awards have led to innovations like a flying, amphibious drone. The Small Business Administration uses agency data to oversee the...
title: Small Business Research Programs: Clearer Guidance Could Improve Award Data to More Effectively Measure Outcomes
